meanings.definition: An ornamental molding around the wall of a room just below the ceiling.
meanings.sent1: The cornices in the living room were beautifully carved and added elegance to the space.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully painted the cornices to match the color scheme of the room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the cornices were perfect for sharpening its claws.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight streaming through the window made the cornices glow like golden ribbons.
meanings.sent5: Visitors often admired the intricate designs of the cornices in the historic building.
